attributes.action: STOP THE SUPER MOSQUE IN ASTLEY BRIDGE BOLTON
attributes.additional_details:
This petition has been set up by the people of Bolton who do not want or need a SUPER MOSQUE.
We are here to tell the corrupt councillors that we say NO!
http://www.theboltonnews.co.uk/news/11281713.Plans_for_new__super__mosque_in_Astley_Bridge/?ref=mr
https://www.facebook.com/pages/Stop-the-Astley-Bridge-Mosque-Bolton/244484865751262?ref_type=bookmark
